data: NSURG Post Operative Pain and Symptom Management
Do not initiate this powerplan if Anesthesia is following the patient
If Respiratory Rate is 8/min OR less:
Order for Duplicate Checking, do not modify
975 mg, PO, QID, drug form: tab
dose range: 325 to 975 mg, PO, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
650 mg, rectal, q6h, PRN pain, drug form: supp

dose range: 5 to 20 mg, PO, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
